short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get direct links of your favourite content in popular file types using google search queries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Harness the power of google search parameters, get direct access to your content and get surprised by the simplicity of this extension.

Access the app from toolbar, then :
Step 1 - Provide the input query ( Eg: Any movie name or document )
Step 2 - Select the category of search ( Eg: Video )
Step 3 - Now select the file type ( Eg: mp4 )
Step 4 - Click on "Go"
You will be presented with direct links from Google search engine itself.

More features in pipline !!

Drop a mail for suggestions
